TypeSignature.Value: public class DuplexClientBase<TChannel> : System.ServiceModel.ClientBase<TChannel> where TChannel : class
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DuplexClientBase`1<class TChannel> extends System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1<!TChannel>

Docs.typeparam: 作成されるチャネルの種類。
Docs.summary: 双方向サービスへのチャネルを作成し、そのチャネルをコールバック オブジェクトに関連付けるために使用されます。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> class to create a channel to a service that specifies a callback object. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexClientBase%601> object wraps a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DuplexChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=fullName> object, which provides the connectivity for the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] object. You can use either type to connect to a duplex service. For more information about duplex services, see [Duplex Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/396b875a-d203-4ebe-a3a1-6a330d962e95).
Special note for Managed C\+\+ users deriving from this class:
- Put your cleanup code in \(On\)\(Begin\)Close \(and\/or OnAbort\), not in a destructor.
- Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto\-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>
- Avoid non\-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto\-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>
- Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> and the finalizer itself from \(On\)\(Begin\)Close \(and\/or OnAbort\) in order to emulate what would have been the auto\-generated <xref:System.IDisposable> behavior.
## 例 The following example shows the use in the client of a duplex [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client type, the `SampleDuplexHelloClient`, to pass a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object with the callback object to listen for callbacks.
[!code-csharp[CallbackBehaviorAttribute\#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CallbackBehaviorAttribute\#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/callbackbehaviorattribute/vb/client.vb#3)]
